entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Shelburne
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:56 AM EST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries this morning. Clearing this afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h gusting to 60 this morning. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 28 this morning and minus 15 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Overcast. Temperature rising to minus 1 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Wind southwest 30 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 1 by morning. Wind chill minus 15 this evening and minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 04 February 2023
